data.name: Address.Get
data.value: SELECT * FROM Address WHERE CostumerId = @costumerId AND Description = @description

data.name: Address.GetAll
data.value: SELECT * FROM Address WHERE CostumerId = @costumerId

data.name: Address.GetById
data.value: SELECT * FROM Address WHERE id = @id

data.name: Address.New
data.value: INSERT INTO Address (CostumerId, Description, Street, number, Complement, PostalCode, Neighborhood, City, State) VALUES (@costumerId, @description, @street, @number, @complement, @postalCode, @neighborhood, @city, @state)

data.name: Address.Update
data.value: UPDATE Address SET CostumerId = @costumerId ,Description = @description ,Street = @street ,number = @number ,Complement = @complement ,PostalCode = @postalCode ,Neighborhood = @neighborhood ,City = @city ,State = @state WHERE id = @id

data.name: Award.GetAll
data.value: SELECT * FROM Award WHERE CostumerId = @costumerId

data.name: Award.Update
data.value: INSERT INTO Award (CostumerId, Description, Amount, DATE) VALUES (@costumerId, @description, @amount, @date)

data.name: Costumer.Get
data.value: SELECT * FROM Costumer WHERE UserId = @userId

data.name: Costumer.GetBalance
data.value: SELECT Balance FROM Costumer WHERE UserId = @userId

data.name: Costumer.New
data.value: INSERT INTO Costumer (UserId, FirstName, LastName) VALUES (@userId, @firstName, @lastName)

data.name: Costumer.Update
data.value: UPDATE Costumer SET FirstName = @firstName ,LastName = @lastName WHERE UserId = @userId

data.name: Costumer.UpdateBalance
data.value: UPDATE Costumer SET Balance = @balance WHERE UserId = @userId

data.name: Order.GetByCostumer
data.value: SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE CostumerId = @costumerId

data.name: Order.New
data.value: INSERT INTO Orders (CostumerId, ProductId, AddressId, OrderStatusId, Amount, DATE) VALUES (@costumerId, @productId, @addressId, @orderStatusId, @amount, @date)

data.name: Product.GetAll
data.value: SELECT * FROM Product WHERE Stock > 0
data.comment: Retorna todos os produtos disponíveis no estoque

data.name: Product.GetAvailableWithCategory
data.value: SELECT PRD.id ,PRD.Name ,PRD.Description ,PRD.Amount ,PRD.Stock ,CT.Description AS Category FROM Product PRD INNER JOIN Category CT ON CT.id = PRD.CategoryId WHERE PRD.Stock > 0
data.comment: Retorna os produtos disponíveis e suas categorias

data.name: Product.GetById
data.value: SELECT * FROM Product WHERE Id = @id

data.name: Product.NewProduct
data.value: INSERT INTO Product (Name, Description, Amount, Stock, CategoryId) Values (@name, @description, @amount, @stock, @categoryId)

data.name: Product.UpdateStock
data.value: UPDATE Product SET Stock = @stock WHERE Id = @id

data.name: User.Auth
data.value: SELECT * FROM UserAccounts WHERE Login = @login AND Pass = @pass

data.name: User.GetById
data.value: SELECT * FROM UserAccounts WHERE Id = @userId

data.name: User.NewUser
data.value: INSERT INTO UserAccounts (login, pass) VALUES(@login, @pass)
